Ranged Weapon Attack:
 +3 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. 
Hit:
 6 (1d10 + 1) piercing damage.
Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage, or 8 (1d10 +
3) slashing damage if used with two hands.
The veteran makes two longsword attacks. If it has a shortsword drawn, it can also make a shortsword attack.
Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

description:
Medium humanoid (any race), any alignment
Veterans are professional fighters that take up arms for pay or to protect something they believe in or value. Their ranks include soldiers retired
from long service and warriors who never served anyone but themselves.
name: Veteran
